item.title: Government shutdown could delay key economic reports at an especially sensitive time
item.description: The federal government shutdown, which began overnight, will delay key reports on the U.S. economy, including a monthly snapshot of the job market, which was scheduled for release on Friday.

item.title: China's ride-hailing companies try to quell the smell in cars where some drivers sleep

item.title: A GOP push to restrict voting by overseas U.S. citizens continues before 2026 midterms
item.description: Republican officials are pushing for more voting restrictions on U.S. citizens who were born abroad and have never lived in the country, after unsuccessfully challenging their ballots in 2024.
